website_summaries.verdict: As a $99 way to turn your phone into a makeshift basic PC, Samsung DeX makes the case if you have an extra monitor and some desk space. But it's best used for light browser work.
pros: Compact size doubles a charging dock
USB, HDMI, Ethernet and USB-C ports support keyboards, mice and monitors
Samsung's clean computer-like layout works well as a basic Chrome-like browser
Multiple apps can run at once in separate windows, even ones that aren't optimized for DeX
cons: The desktop-style layout requires a monitor or TV to set up, plus BYO computer accessories
Only a few truly DeX-optimized apps exist, and Microsoft Office requires a subscription to use

customer_reviews.title: Use Developer mode to make all apps work with DEX
customer_reviews.text: I was initially disappointed with the range of DEX apps, and spent hours hunting for newly DEX-aware versions. Then I discovered that if you open settings->Dex Mode->About Dex Mode, and click the dex logo five times, it switches to 'Developer Mode', which allows all apps to be resizable and go full screen. I've gotten VNC, Remote Desktop, an android terminal, and many other apps to work; for light computing this is entirely good enough to replace a desktop. Also great for organizing your photos and writing long emails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to mirror screen while charging, ok for other stuff
customer_reviews.text: Got to say I like it. Screen mirroring is where it's at. Amazon now supports screen mirror!. Edit 10/09/18. My dex pad was on the fritz with the output going in and out. Also would go white screen randomly. I had a difficult time getting Samsung to honor warranty as they couldn't find my serial number. But Amazon replaced it. It was only 3 months old when it died. So, minus one star for crapping out, plus one for supporting screen mirror. Net stays at 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MW osu

customer_reviews.title: Just a bad company
customer_reviews.text: Purchase product did not work Samsung set me an exchange which was the exact same unit as I marked it before I sent it .Samsung will not replace and they told me it was the same unit according to their records. Absolutely no support this product is the worst product I've ever purchased. Now looking to replace all my samsung equipment including my phones.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Great device and a cheap and awesome way to add ...
customer_reviews.text: Great device and a cheap and awesome way to add a "pc" to your life if you don't already have one. The only thing is the way the cables come out the back is sloppy in my opinion. The dock is sleek but you have 5 cables coming out from all over the place in the back. it makes it looked cluttered
customer_reviews.author: Justin Fay

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 solid weeks of use I highly recommend this to complete the Galaxy S8/8+ experience!!! You have to use this to understand how awesome the experience us. To clear up any misunderstandings, you can use any combination of Bluetooth, wired, and wireless keyboard and mouse. You can also plug in hard drives and thumb drives.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at work to put my phone on my big screen tv. 2 days in and my laptop crashed!! I was so lucky I had this. I did 90% of my work using the Dex station and didn't miss a beat. Trust me it's not going to replace your computer but It worked perfect in a pinch. The only issue i have, that you cant adjust the screen size to fit what screen your working on.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Use your S8 all the time!!
customer_reviews.text: Adds 1 Gbps ethernet, USB 2 ports, HDMI output to your S8 phone so you can run a full multi window desktop with your phone at home!! Using a cheap 32" 1920x1080 tv (full HD) + optical mouse and keyboard at home with no complex changeover or configurations!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually complicates the process of using the Dex interface.
customer_reviews.text: I returned mine because I realized I could purchase a cable to do the exact same thing except my phone would not be charging while I was using it. But since I don't plan on using this for more than a few minutes at a time, that's not a big deal for me. My suggestion is to find a USBC to HDMI cable and purchase yourself a Bluetooth keyboard and mouse. The other thing is, if you're using any kind of sturdy case to protect your phone you're out of luck. You'll have to take your phone out of the case in order for it to set properly in the Cradle. This is why a simple cable works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Cruz

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed because this is the first item that a got from you guys. I just bought a DeX station and when I plug everything in, (HDMI, power, input devices), DeX won't start, even the phone is not charging when it's docked. I am currently using the out-of-the-box charger, with Adaptive Fast Charging together with the original cable, and have tried to use a friend's S8 Fast Charger to no avail either, although my phone, when plugged directly to the fast charger, detects it as fast charging.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Almonte (BM-205272)

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't even work. It'll charge my Note8 if I plug the phone into one of the OTG ports via a second USB-C cord. (in place of the mouse or keyboard) but when plugged directly into dock, absolutely zero response. No matter the combination of connected devices/power supply.
customer_reviews.author: Robbyn

customer_reviews.title: Great interface. Does not play all through dex controls.
customer_reviews.text: Makes ALLOT of cords so if you are using it as a dock at you computer it should work fine with a HDMI to DVi cable and a wirless keyboard and mouse. Most people screen cast the S8 and find that better but the gui of the DEX is awesome and really works and looks like a laptop.. DOES NOT play all phone games over DEX
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hager

customer_reviews.title: one flaw makes it unusable
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this device. I hooked it up but didnt turn on. a bit of troubleshooting and nothing. then I hooked it without the case and then it worked. seriously, how can samsung can this past testing. who would have galaxy phone without a case. its such a hassle to remove the case everytime one wants to use the device. this would have been a keeper if it wasnt fr this flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Arun9

customer_reviews.title: Wotks EXACTLY as advertised, great product
customer_reviews.text: Those who wrote negative reviews on this product puzzle me. This turns your S8 into an Android powered computer. It works extremely well. Everything I expected, none of the negatives, and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It works really good. I just connected a Logitech unifier usb receiver and in 5 minutes I was already working with my wireless mouse and keyboard and a Dell monitor. I had whatsup app, facebook app, and excel open while watching a video. It connects by itself once you pair your hardware, and set the phone in the craddle. All tha is great. The only downside is that not all apps work in a resizable window, but in a phone screen size. Samsung needs to produce more apps that are fully compatible with this unit. As it is, it works great and has saved me a lot of work when I'm on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Kharon

customer_reviews.title: Great for "computer" use
customer_reviews.text: Great for "computer" use. If a person didn't want to purchase a computer they could use their phone for a very effective one. Also great camping watching Netflix videos.
customer_reviews.author: steveareno

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular device...for the four weeks it worked.
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Dex is an extraordinary device that completely turns the Samsung Galaxy phone into a full-fledged computer and multimedia center. However, the device I ordered failed after only four weeks and, given the shipping time that puts me just over 30 days since purchase, it cannot be returned. $57 for four weeks operation isn't worth it, making this a one-star product despite it's tremendous capabilities because it is far too unreliable (and un-returnable) to be anything but a source of frustration and disappointment (comparable to Samsung's foldable screen--great concept, terrible execution).
customer_reviews.author: RICK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little gadget. Cant wait until the next version of the dex pad. I ditched my Windows laptop and an using a Samsung galaxy note 8 as my full time device. Only small things could make this a 5 star rating. Can't use bixby while docked. But can use Google assistant. Won't recognize anything over 786 gb(might be off I knew he number a while ago) for external hard drive. Contacted Samsung, and they are not even sure why either. My guess is because the ad card size is not the traditional 2 tb max like other androids.
customer_reviews.author: colin fahey

customer_reviews.title: NOT a wireless charger, doesn't work if you have even a thin case
customer_reviews.text: While it would be "nice" to have a wired ethernet port, I'm not going to pry my phone out of the Spigen Thin Armor case every time I want to use this! And it "looked" like a wireless charging pad, which would have been a value to have at my desk, if available in the same package that created a "DeX" environment. But it's NOT. How disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Fred.Up

customer_reviews.title: GREAT IDEA BUT USELESS WITHOUT DEVELOPER SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: PROS: This is a wonderful idea. The item was easy to use. Can check / send text messages without having to use your phone. Ethernet port for faster web surfing CONS: All sounds come only from the phone and not the TV. Very limited amount of apps work full screen. Very limited amount of apps work in landscape mode. Windows cannot be resized.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTCALLMEPHILLYB

customer_reviews.title: This might become my new main desktop.
customer_reviews.text: I am having so much fun with this thing. The desktop interface does everything I want my primary personal computer to do. I have the full MS Office suite installed. I can RDP out to cloud systems. Will not use for software development or photo editing, but it does a great job on all of the usual stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after using it few times
customer_reviews.text: USB-C power charging port seems to have been damaged by trying to insert a micro USB cable into it. Easy to forget it is USB-C, just label the port to avoid confusion! The whole thing now does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Z2000

customer_reviews.title: After downloading some essential apps this device is pretty useable
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed at first when I saw that most apps didn't open in full screen, but after I did some research I found some apps that expand the functions of this device and that made all the difference. I also really like that my tablet monitor fully works with the stylus and I was able to use art programs much more easily than on the phone itself.
customer_reviews.author: sinister

customer_reviews.title: The big flaw with this design is it doesnt work ...
customer_reviews.text: The big flaw with this design is it doesnt work with most cases. So if you want to remove your case everytime just to plug and play it's a pain. It will however serve as a cheap Chromebook alternative if you don't normally use a case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: What a great little device I was thinking of a way I could save money on a game system I got the Samsung dex and glad I did I'm able to play games in real time no lagging when connected to ps4 controller un like the Google chromecast which dosent allow you to play in real time it lags just a little..I would also recommend this to anyone looking to save money on a desktop by using your galaxy note 8 or s series and use with bluetooth wireless key board works like a charm for all basic uses.
customer_reviews.author: francis

customer_reviews.title: Design flaws
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this item - not sure if it's truly from Samsung or not. Tried to hook up USB cables and other cables to rear of product with great difficulty. You have to rock the connectors back and forth to try and get them to go in and seat properly - had to force them in and thought I would break something. It doesn't appear the product is syncing up very well with my S8 and the reception is not very good with HDMI cable. It's just been sitting on my desk for a few weeks now, not being used. I'll give it a little while to see if everything clears up and "breaks in."
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nifty device, I wished I would of gotten it sooner, since I might be switching out my S8+ for the next model. This accessory helps expands the phone capabilities to that of a desktop. I was able to multitask a bit and do a few things here and there. Not quite a desktop replacement, but it was getting pretty close. Currently, not all apps work with the accessory, so you'll see some limitations pop up when using certain apps, but there are dex approved apps out there.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. I can answer emailon big monitor.it works same as windows.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: No 4k on Galaxy S9+
customer_reviews.text: It has 4k written on the box but doesn't actually do 4k to the TV with my Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus. I've tried multiple HDMI cables which have carried 4k signals from my MacMini. I was hoping that reviews were not representing my phone with this but they were. The DeX experience itself is also a bit lacking with only basic productivity apps working on it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product USE the wall charger it comes with. Fan doesn't start when unit ges turned on.
customer_reviews.text: Unit works we, small problem getting it started though, hadit just plugged into a wall standard usb changer, this does'nt seem to work. Use the standard charger it came with works fne. also downloaded a program called DEX/MAX launches all you normal apps in a more usable adjustable window.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Handy device for a quick workstation
customer_reviews.text: For apps that are compatible, the DeX station works great. One negative though, is that not all apps are compatible. Some won't work at all; others will only work in a small window. The other downside is that if you have a phone case, you'll probably have to remove the case to dock the phone. Despite the two negatives, the dock is a handy tool to setup a quick, personal workstation. It worked well with the USB and bluetooth devices keyboards and mice I tried.
customer_reviews.author: john264

customer_reviews.title: A dream come true...wait till the others find out!
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit to get it set up, but once you do! So much to see and do. I love having all my devices in one place. No more picking up my phone, then my tablet, running over to my computer etc etc, back and forth. This is great! I highly recommend the Logitech K780 Keyboard to accompany it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelona

customer_reviews.title: Good but not fantastic. I hope one day this idea becomes more practical
customer_reviews.text: Good for traveling if you dont have a laptop. Great idea but it's far from replacing a laptop even with all the power inside samsung devices. Problem lies with the lack of apps optimize for mouse and keyboard. It doesnt double as a wireless charger which is a bummer and you have to buy a separate attachment if you want to use it without removing your case. Overall its neat toy that's slightly better then getting a little net book.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed overall
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed overall, I bought this for theDEX which works fine, but the charging aspect sucks. I thought it was the wireless charging dock with DEX features but it is not. You must remove your case everytime you charge and it still must be seated on the USB-C in the station. A couple times I put it on only to find out in the morning that it was not seated and did not charge. At this price definitely not worth the money for just the DEX features, it is still easier to just leave the case on and plugin with my charging wire.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kampman

customer_reviews.title: NO POWER SUPPLY INCUDED. UNIT DOES WORK
customer_reviews.text: Description states that it comes with one but it doesn't. I ordered one the power supply for my phone. I ordered a second and no power supply included. Device works great but two stars for inaccurate description. Four stars for functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Young

customer_reviews.title: Samsung control to much of what you can use on ...
customer_reviews.text: Samsung control to much of what you can use on the dock, no Firefox or full screen streaming apps unless you use screen mirror
customer_reviews.author: John Jones

customer_reviews.title: and it's nice to have all my apps on the big screen
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe this was so cheap! Most convenient computer I've ever owned, and it's nice to have all my apps on the big screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Peek

customer_reviews.title: Bad packing and wrong charger sent with the unit.
customer_reviews.text: I like the dock for when I am working but the USB charger they sent with it will not power it and the phone. I have to use the charger that came with my phone to power the unit. I wish there was some way they could send the proper power supply.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Van Arsdale

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Dad, he uses it daily for work and play
customer_reviews.text: Works great for extra monitor usage and big-screen mobile usage. Some QoL adjustments could be made, but for the most part it does what it was supposed to do and since I got it for half off on sale, I can't complain. Dad loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jello

customer_reviews.title: When it works, its a nice setup.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and interesting concept. Have issues getting it to launch the DEX app at least 40-50% of the time but when it does, it's pretty slick. Using a bluetooth keyboard with a built in trackpad so only need to have the monitor and power connected to it.
customer_reviews.author: The Brady Report

customer_reviews.title: Useful patch for after work hours
customer_reviews.text: If you want to do things that are not very demanding (mailing, MS office) and take advantage of app experience on Android, this is a tool for you. I like using it after work hours, and the multitasking experience is very good. There is no easy drag and drop typical for PCs but if you need it for casual time plus light work its great. One advice - if you use Netflix, use the screen mirroring and not the Dex mode - because of the full screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Gligorijevic

customer_reviews.title: Works great with S8+ and Note 8
customer_reviews.text: Loving the device so far. Works great with S8+ and Note 8. No lag so far and love the interface. A great differentiating feature for me to go with Samsung over other OEMs
customer_reviews.author: Avijit Sarkar

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! Why would Samsung put their name on this product! It didnt work, I tried everything!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Amazing. Congrats, Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable. Works great and goes beyond the productivity, having a smartphone and desktop features, amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Best USA Goods Corp

customer_reviews.title: It just works once you have the right power source
customer_reviews.text: Everything works and it's all Genuine Samsung. The seller didn't send the right power plug and then stated they would send a new one but didn't. I had to replace myself but this works awesome.
customer_reviews.author: UNiiKsTyLes

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Works good for what I need. Would have been 5 stars but, you have to pay attention when you plug it in and I have to take off my protective cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DEX is Worth-It
customer_reviews.text: Wish more apps could be used full- screen. I use my phone 24/7 for work and personal. I really would like ALL apps to be fully DEX compatible, but I understand that the apps themselves have some work to do.
customer_reviews.author: Harold M. Breaux Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It does what I need
customer_reviews.text: It actually works pretty darn well. I live where I have very little wi-fi so I use it to mirror some tv shows from my phone to the tv. It also works pretty well to get a desktop experience without having an actual pc. I live in an rv full time so I dont have room for a computer.
customer_reviews.author: Bman's mom

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it says it does. Totally converts your phone into a pc experience. Only drawback is that you can't use w3bsites that involve java or flash player. Would be great if I could play dungeons and dragons
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Redemption!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon you redeemed yourself the previous dock I got for dex was a switch dock off brand. Needless to say that did not work. Got the real deal and with a few adjustments dex came up and ran
customer_reviews.author: John Mule

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks the need to carry multiple electronics
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful for travel, definitely lowers the need to carry all three gadgets of a cell/tablet/laptop combo.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Turns your phone into a computer, well partially.
customer_reviews.text: Not every app works in this mode but for the ones I use, chrome, youtube, email, etc I'm very happy with it. Just being able to use a monitor keyboard and mouse makes the phone a little more like having one computer for everything.
customer_reviews.author: JamesS

customer_reviews.title: This is a "good" device to give your phone a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a "good" device to give your phone a new capability. The issue I ran into though is I use a case which the USB plug isn't high enough or long enough to fit through the case. This caused me to get a short extension piece to allow me to use it.
customer_reviews.author: K P

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great my phone is my laptop now and tv
customer_reviews.text: Who needs a laptop? This thing is great my phone is my laptop now and tv. the only thing is to take full advantage you do need to install third party software like DexMax
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Came to my house not working never worked try everything connecting in two different devices still never worked didn't even charge the phone up or anything
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Always charges fast and easy with no plugging into the phone
customer_reviews.text: This is the most practical charger I have ever owned. Always charges fast and easy with no plugging into the phone. Just set it down and it is charging in about a second. Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: Tdorn

customer_reviews.title: Will not Powe Up very well Used
customer_reviews.text: The product looks very used. Will not power up. Come on Amazon why are you letting me down on a regular basis?
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Broken after return period ended
customer_reviews.text: The dex station is a really cool concept, but the execution isn't great. All the ports stopped working pretty quickly. Only used it a few times too. How I know it's broken. Checked every connection. HDMI cords are working fine with my computer. Charging cord works with phone. Both don't work on the dex.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Song

customer_reviews.title: Alternative Desktop
customer_reviews.text: Nice effort by Samsung that needs further development and support. Any app on the Phone can essentially be run on the desktop. Not all programs run well but some of major productivity ones do. Kind of reminds me of a cross between a mac and a chromebook plus.
customer_reviews.author: John Shaw Hodson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works Great. Except Google Earth does not work with Dex.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Pryor

customer_reviews.title: DeX station Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It's unique, I'll say that much about it. It just didn't workout for me. A couple small things about it I just didn't care for. The work around using the app DexMax in order to get some of the apps to run in full screen. My wireless keyboard not functioning correctly when I was running remote desktop into my laptop computer. Could I work with it and get what I need done, sure but it would have continued to bother me so why bother.
customer_reviews.author: Dean D Haried

customer_reviews.title: Not too functional
customer_reviews.text: This idea is great but its very limited. Don't get if you want to replace your PC for any functional work.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Montelongo

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy/Note 8 only
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as working for Galaxy and Note 9 and 10, but not compatible. Works with Note 8 only. Otherwise pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Fun little item for any tech geek
customer_reviews.text: Fun little item for any tech geek. I honestly dont see the big need to use my phone a larger monitor screen seeing how most apps will not scale properly. It is fun to play with and experiment.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this for my Samsung phone on the big screen
customer_reviews.author: Harun Darius Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: It does what it claims. A lot of apps don't work with it though such as Amazon products. Interesting but HDMI cable does what it tries to do.
customer_reviews.author: Raminak

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of an idea
customer_reviews.text: Very few program work with it. Forget about using it to watch movies on it. Vudu will open but it only show in a small panel not full screen. Movies Anywhere refuse to open. Try to open video from a web site tell you to download the app that does not work with Dex. I had a windows phone and when you plug it into a monitor it work great. What the hell Samsung but allow the app to scale to full screen please.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again if I had it to do over again! No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, works great and has so much functionality! Highly recommend for galaxy s8/s8+ users! Great for productivity and nearly all Google and Samsung apps work in full screen.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: yesssss
customer_reviews.text: why did they cancel linux on dex?!?!?!?!? Oh well, geek on I shall regardless
customer_reviews.author: phil may

customer_reviews.title: Great add-on to your smartphone
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a small computer for my monitor to watch youtube and browse internet. This station is tiny, works pretty fast and does everything i wanted. It doesn't work with my case, but you can shorten small plastic bumpers on the dock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased this...
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this instead of a laptop. Very useful for light use... Such as YouTube Facebook etc.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Bad design.
customer_reviews.text: Bad design. Worthless to me because it won't work with any case on my phone, and with the price of phones these days, I must have a case. May be cool but didn't even get a chance to try it.
customer_reviews.author: S.W.A.T. A/V

customer_reviews.title: Great Device to feel the Desktop Experience
customer_reviews.text: I just got the Dex and it is great. It is almost like a computer. Great to work with Office documents, Photo editing and much more. i really recomend it!
customer_reviews.author: Frank N.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: was way to buggy for me but like the idea
customer_reviews.author: Sunniesboy

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it..I use it every day..make surr you go into the phones dex setting and change the audio from the device to the TV screen your using and also turn on the setting to enlarge the app cause it doesn't do it right away
customer_reviews.author: larry padilla

customer_reviews.title: Works for Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.text: Was using to try and get data off a phone with a broken screen. Kinda difficult to get to show up on a monitor, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Lon

customer_reviews.title: The device works great. I just wish some apps like Kindle worked
customer_reviews.text: The device works great. I just wish some apps like Kindle worked.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Clay

customer_reviews.title: I really don't see the purpose of this when you ...
customer_reviews.text: I really don't see the purpose of this when you can simply download Samsung's sync app and use your phone for free via Bluetooth or Wifi. Yes there some options that help give the PC experience but it's not worth the money or additional items (keyboard, mouse, hdmi cords) that you will have to buy.
customer_reviews.author: ACEO

customer_reviews.title: Works for note 9
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and easy to use, love the idea of docking my phone and having a computer at hand with out the bulky desktop or laptop at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Brieger

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy the refurbished unit.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for 2 months and used it around a dozen times. It has stopped working save yourself some time and buy a new unit only.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome as a desktop PC
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome as a desktop PC, so convenient, highly recommend! I can see these being the wave of the future.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Zarling

customer_reviews.title: Great item used on a samsung galaxy s10plus
customer_reviews.text: Great way to turn your phone into your PC. Love it! It charges the phone as well
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carr

customer_reviews.title: This Dex is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: The dex station has turned my phone into a laptop! Way better than I expected. I hunt a lot and use my phone as a GPS. Dex has allowed me to blow up my maps to a 20" screen and add waypoints and see areas in a whole new light. I am connected to a 20" monitor, wireless keyboard and mouse.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM R. MCCORD JR.

customer_reviews.title: Love Samsung!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is brilliant and it truly works well. It’s everything I thought I could do plus MORE!!! I no longer need to replace my aging laptop now.
customer_reviews.author: Nolasco

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with S8+
customer_reviews.text: DEX would not pair with Samsung Galaxy S8+ at all. Online "how-to" videos gave instructions better than the included product booklet. Despite trying different connection sequences, unit would not recognize phone or even pass-through charge. Do not bother.
customer_reviews.author: Warthog

customer_reviews.title: Being able to take this on the road and plug into a HDMI TV makes life a joy now.
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible device. Doesn't entirely replace a desktop computer, yet now that I am using this, I don't use my computer more than an hour a week. Being able to take this on the road and plug into a HDMI TV makes life a joy now.
customer_reviews.author: JCM

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: used maybe 3 x... tried to use again... inop. waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jay W.

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, and if you have trouble with audio through your phone like me you can use the Samsung connect app to help you
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Skroski

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the fact that you can't change from portrait to landscape when you dock your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Fineous

customer_reviews.title: S9+ Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works Great, Highly recommend an adapter so you can keep your phone in case and still plug it in. Case and phone will not plug in enough to work. Only phone will fit. Using a Samsung Galaxy S9+
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Barron Jr

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Does about 10% of what you are expecting. Glitches constantly and has hardly any apps that support it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Hurley

customer_reviews.title: False item description: this is a UK version not US
customer_reviews.text: This is not a US version. Descriptuon states the item is US version. The item received is a UK version. I am unable to register product though samsung. False advertising, please send the correct item as describe during purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Austria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, use it everyday at work as a second vomouter.
customer_reviews.author: Joon

customer_reviews.title: Meh?
customer_reviews.text: Its great for what it is but no one uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Sai_aquarius

customer_reviews.title: Great option for me when I deploy
customer_reviews.text: Great option for me when I deploy. No need to carry a laptop around for basic tasks. Bringing a TV for movies anyways so why not let it double as a computer when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Bader

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted this for over a year, very happy with it, however, I wish there was a mic Jack on it. This is the perfect cable cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to get it to work due to lack of places to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Blair

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit with protective case on my phone.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't accommodate protective case. I wish I had seen all the other reviews on this subject before I purchased. Looking for an adapter/extension before I am forced to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Works for my Galaxy note 8 but it is slow charge only, easy to use just plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Works for my Galaxy note 8 but it is slow charge only, easy to use just plug and play
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Very handy when doing email on the phone.
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a little tricking. The Instructions were for screen display were hard to understand. Once I was able to get the set up sorted out it has been flawless. Using my phone with a larger computer screen and keyboard if very helpfull.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bradway

customer_reviews.title: Should have been better
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get it to work properly, it would either have major input lag or freeze up.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

product_meta.title: Samsung DeX Station, Desktop Experience for Samsung Galaxy Note8 , Galaxy S8, S8+, S9, and S9+ W/ AFC USB-C Wall Charger (US Version with Warranty)
product_meta.description: The Samsung DeX Station enables you to turn your Samsung Galaxy S8 / S8+ into a true desktop PC experience. By docking the Galaxy S8 / S8+ into the DeX Station, your phone will launch a special DeX mode on the connected external monitor and applications can be opened in multiple separate windows. Connect a mouse, keyboard, and Ethernet cable for added productivity.
feature_bullets: Convert your smartphone into a desktop computer
Built in fan to keep your phone cool while docked
Closes to flat disk for easy packing ; Includes Fast Charge Travel Adapter and USB-C cable
Ports: 2x USB-A 2.0, USB-C Charging, LAN Ethernet, HDMI Output ; Connect a mouse, keyboard, and Ethernet cable for added productivity

The Samsung DeX Station enables you to turn your Galaxy Note8, Galaxy S8 or Galaxy S8 plus into a true desktop PC experience. By docking the Galaxy Note8, Galaxy S8 or Galaxy S8 plus into the DeX Station, your phone will launch a special DeX mode on the connected external monitor and applications can be opened in multiple separate windows

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars914 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: USB-C Cable, Fast Charge Wall Charger, Dex Station, Quick Start Guide
